participant_1.background:
I'd brag about using my fame to advocate for animal welfare and conservation.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
I wore my favorite color sneakers to Comic Con and had a great time!
My dogs are my most valued possessions.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, where I learned to love ice cream.
I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories.
we drink beer and eat food.
My favorite fruit is watermelon because it is sweet and refreshing.
I am looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just hanging out. How about you?
I'm good. I just got back from Comic Con and had a great time.
Oh cool! I've never been to Comic Con. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! There are lots of people dressed up as their favorite characters from comics, movies, and TV shows.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm a big fan of comic books, so I'd probably love it.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
Me too! I love reading and watching movies. I'm not as big into video games, but I do enjoy playing them sometimes.
What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really like the Harry Potter series.
Me too! I've read all of the books and seen all of the movies.
Me too! They're so good.
So, what are you up to this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
I'm not sure either. Maybe we could hang out?
That would be fun! I'd love to hang out with you.
Great! We can make plans later.
Sounds good
